exposures

Source: R/meta-data.R
exposures.Rd

Exposure data.

Usage

exposures

Format

A data.frame with 855 rows and 5 variables:

member

character. DESCRIPTION.

program_year

double. DESCRIPTION.

department

character. DESCRIPTION.

payroll

double. DESCRIPTION.

miles

double. DESCRIPTION.
